nodes.text: Pax was an astronomical object located in the Expansion Region and the Trailing Sectors regions, in the grid square N-16 of the Standard Galactic Grid. The hyperspace route known as the Hydian Way linked Pax to the Chardaan system and the location known as ZeHeth, while another route connected it to Kira and Vondarc.

Pax was first mentioned in the current Star Wars canon in the fourty-third issue of Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon magazine, published around October 28, 2015. The Pax system was originally introduced in the Star Wars Legends continuity via the 1993 book Twin Stars of Kira, a supplement for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. In the book, the star system appeared in the roleplaying game adventure "Treasure Hunt," which was written by Todd Quigley, with Tim Eldred providing illustrations.
